sentences.sContent: Defining the town center of Râmnicu Vâlcea is a towering shopping mall that looks like a giant glass igloo.
sentences.sContent_eng: Defining the town center of Râmnicu Vâlcea is a towering shopping mall that looks like a giant glass igloo.
sentences.sCn: 沃尔恰市中心的地标性建筑是一座高耸的购物商场，它看上去就像是一座巨型的玻璃圆顶建筑。

sentences.sContent: When you sign up, you adopt an animated penguin to chat to friends, play games, explore, collect coins and even personalise your very own igloo.
sentences.sContent_eng: When you sign up, you adopt an animated penguin to chat to friends, play games, explore, collect coins and even personalise your very own igloo.
sentences.sCn: 当你注册后，你就会领养一直动画企鹅，与朋友聊天，玩游戏，探索，收集硬币，甚至个性化你自己的圆顶冰屋。

sentences.sContent: The next morning he and Egarter Vigl spruced up the body with a fine spray of sterilized water, which froze on contact. Then they slid the Iceman back into his high-tech igloo and closed the door.
sentences.sContent_eng: The next morning he and Egarter Vigl spruced up the body with a fine spray of sterilized water, which froze on contact. Then they slid the Iceman back into his high-tech igloo and closed the door.
sentences.sCn: 第二天早上，他和维格用一种很好的喷雾消毒水通过其冰冻接触清洁了冰人，之后将他滑进他的高科技圆顶建筑，关上门。

trans.tranOther: Igloos are dome-shaped houses built from blocks of snow by the Inuit people
